value.text:
Hey there! 👋

I'm Lunora, your friendly AI study companion for Indian students. Super excited to help you ace your studies! 😊

What subject or topic can I assist you with today? Whether it's maths, science, or anything else from your CBSE/ICSE syllabus, I've got you covered!
follow_up_questions: What grade are you studying in?
Which subject do you need help with?
What's the specific topic or problem you're stuck on?
